description: {"blocks":[{"key":"35a1d","text":"Here we present a protocol for quantitative immunostaining of intracellular accessible cholesterol using ALOD4-mNeon in human fibroblasts. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"b81rv","text":"Be sure to use freshly prepared ALOD4-mNeon (within 14 days of preparation).  Store at 4°C and do not freeze.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"rjbq","text":"Paraformaldehyde 16% Solution (Electron Microscopy Sciences # 15710) diluted fresh in 1X PBS","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"m6am","text":"Glass coverslips (Fisher Scientific #12-545-81)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dtbo","text":"Rat tail collagen (Gibco by Life Technologies # A10483-01)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"br8og","text":"Saponin (Sigma # S7900)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"507eu","text":"Bovine serum albumin (Equitech-Bio, Inc. #BAH65)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmiuj","text":"Human fibroblasts (Coriell Institute of Medical Research)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4k3pp","text":"ALOD4-mNeon (https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.rm7vzx2qxgx1/v1) freshly prepared and never frozen","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":13,"length":56}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":56}],"data":{}},{"key":"5oi6f","text":"Mowiol mounting solution","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8gimg","text":"FIJI/ImageJ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1223d","text":"Latest edition CellProfiler software 4.04 (or later)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"ED3459743D5F11EFB1600A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.rm7vzx2qxgx1/v1"}}}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"ft20p","text":"Stirling DR, Swain-Bowden MJ, Lucas AM, Carpenter AE, Cimini BA, Goodman A (2021). CellProfiler 4: improvements in speed, utility and usability. BMC Bioinformatics, 22 (1), 433. PMID: 34507520 PMCID: PMC8431850.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fskab","text":"This section describes plating and staining of cells and image acquisition.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9nq2q","text":"Seed 0.2 X 106 cells onto 3-4 collagen-coated 12 mm coverslips, in each well of a six-well plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":13,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"blvra","text":"16-18 hr after plating, wash the cells once with 1X PBS ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eh3ka","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4hi0j","text":"Transfer each coverslip to a well of a 24-well plate containing 500µl   PFA per well; fix the cells for   at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":70,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":104,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":109,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"m1jd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"4","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9k82k","text":"Wash cells 3X with 1X PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f9pho","text":"Permeabilize the cells by addition of 0.1% Saponin in 1X PBS for   at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":70,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1pesn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"27sp6","text":"Wash cells 3X with 1X PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"60rgc","text":"Block fixative by addition of 1% BSA in 1X PBS for   at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ed6i9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"906qk","text":"Dilute ALOD4-mNeon to 4µM in 1% BSA/1X PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b47l4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"57qpc","text":"Add 50 µl, 4µM ALOD4 per coverslip ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"580r0","text":"Incubate cells for   at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2glbg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1mnq","text":"Wash cells 3X in 1X PBS and mount coverslips onto clean glass slides with 4 µl Mowiol. Air-dry coverslips overnight or at least 4-5 hours; store in dark at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":156,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a70k9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eufm6","text":"Images below were acquired using a Zeiss laser scanning microscope.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Batch process images for maximum intensity projection and background subtraction
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e7tum","text":"Images need to be batch processed for maximum intensity projection and uniform background subtraction.  Process the images for CellProfiler analysis as described in dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.3byl4bpo8vo5/v1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":165,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":165,"length":48}],"data":{}},{"key":"am5ah","text":"FOOTNOTE: For Zeiss images, the user needs to specify the folder to save the processed images and run lines 26, 27, and 29. Processing includes maximum intensity projection and background subtraction. Choose a value for background subtraction based on the images analyzed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B0FE1A723D6011EFB1600A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.3byl4bpo8vo5/v1"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ea1s0","text":"In CellProfiler, select the Images module, drag and drop the background subtracted and maximum intensity projected, .TIF files created in Step 14 above.  Here we subtracted a value of 50 to remove the background noise.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ain2e","text":"Select the Metadata module","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95q66","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79q24","text":"In the Metadata module: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9rj7","text":"Extract metadata? Yes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"15sad","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2g9nr","text":"Metadata extraction method: Extract from image file headers ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a95g2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahu3k","text":"Extract metadata from: All images ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4lbi4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5m33","text":"Hit “Extract metadata”  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6d42h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3664v","text":"Click Add another extraction method ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8oog9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6fbdn","text":"Metadata extraction method: Extract from file/folder names ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5d0a7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b3hne","text":"Metadata source: File name ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2j4ld","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fptig","text":"Regular expression to extract from file name: “Regex” will be as follows: ^GM(?P[0-9]{4}) .*#(?P[0-9]{2}) for an example file name “GM01607.czi #01_max.tif”. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dim0r","text":"This step helps to extract the cell line, and position from each file name.  In Regex, ^ indicates the beginning of the file name (?P[0-9]{4}) tells the program to name the captured field “Cell line” and recognize five digits that follow .* indicates any character (?P[0-9]{2}) tells the program to name the captured field “position” and recognize two digits that follow.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cpji1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cco1r","text":"Metadata data type: Text ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b9lrh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8rb5f","text":"Hit “update” to populate the metadata field","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
